articles.author: PN Vishnu, PN Vishnu
articles.title: Euro 2024 Final Highlights: Spain beat England 2-1 to clinch record fourth European championship title - Firstpost
articles.description: Euro 2024 Final, Spain vs England Highlights: Spain beat England 2-1 on the back of goals from Nico Williams and Mikel Oyarzabal. Cole Palmer’s equaliser eventually went in vain.
articles.content: Euro 2024 Final, Spain vs England Preview: Its that time of the year again. Three-time champions Spain will lock horns against England in the final of the 2024 European Championships at the Olympiast… [+2002 chars]
